abstract: A developing relationship between investors and entrepreneurs in Brazil comes as venture capital firms in the United States are starting to take notice.
snippet: A developing relationship between investors and entrepreneurs in Brazil comes as venture capital firms in the United States are starting to take notice.
lead_paragraph: CAMPINAS, Brazil - When the investment firm Monashees Capital first called Juliano Ipolito, the co-founder of an online handicrafts marketplace, he assumed that he would have to visit the firm in São Paulo.

headline.main: Nurturing Start-Ups in Brazil, With a Nod to Silicon Valley
